2164.subject: JAPN
2164.descrlong:
This course uses Japanese manga and anime as modern mirrors that reflect the Japanese experience of rapid economic and social transformation over the past 150 years. From ancient Japanese styles of visual expression, this course traces how popular visual texts such as Manga and Anime sketch out a parallel world linked both historically and culturally to the imagined community of the Japanese nation-state. Taught in English.  

(Prereq: Junior or Senior Standing)
